description:
Here's a one-jacket solution for those who split their time between bike commutes and adventures on foot. Waterproof-breathable and packable, the Syncline has the look and fit of a hiking shell, with cycling friendly features like a helmet-compatible hood, drop back hem and extensive reflective piping.

  • 2.5-layer waterproof breathable construction
  • Fully taped seams for maximum waterproofness
  • Adjustable hood is low profile to fit under a helmet
  • Brushed facing on chinguard is soft against your skin
  • Full front zip is backed by a storm flap
  • Dual vents are positioned for easy access and maximum effectiveness
  • Handwarmer pockets feature water resistant zips for secure storage
  • Hoop and loop cuff closures
  • Adjustable drop hem provides extended coverage in the riding position, and can be cinched to keep out drafts
  • Reflective piping enhances visibility from all angles.
  • As of 2020 Showers Pass is Climate Neutral certified, meaning they fully offset their carbon emissions. Climate Neutral certified is a consumer label that's carried by brands who take responsibility for greenhouse gas emissions generated in production, operation and shipping of their goods and services
name: Showers Pass Syncline CC Jacket - Women's
